Preface
This website is about the PREGVAL project.

title: 1¬† Quality Check: Processing SIP. Empadronados
text:
1.1 Input






The table to be analysed is sip.csv.

title: 1¬† Quality Check: Processing SIP. Empadronados
text:
1.2 Check variables



The variables extracted from SIP are: sip, fecha_calculo, fecha_nacimiento, sexo, pais_nacimiento, sit_empadronamiento, derecho_farmacia, dpto_salud, zona_salud, fecha_alta, fecha_baja, causa_baja, fecha_defuncion, raf_ilimi, raf_ipago, and apsig.




1.2.1 Check mandatory vars
All mandatory vars are present.





1.2.2 Check all vars
mod_acred, residencia_cod_desc, centro_cod_desc, clave_medica, codigo_postal, nif_profesional, and causa_alta were not extracted.


1.2.3 Completeness
In Figure¬†1.1 is shown the percentage of non-missing values for each variable. Non-mandatory variables are shown at the bottom of the graph.


















Figure¬†1.1: Variables completeness
